question: Hello

subject: How to Cancel Membership
question: How do I cancel my membership or subscription?
answer:
To cancel your Creditor Academy membership:

1. Log into your account at creditoracademy.com
2. Go to Account Settings or Profile
3. Click on 'Billing' or 'Subscription'
4. Select 'Cancel Subscription'
5. Follow the prompts to confirm cancellation

Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. If you have trouble canceling online, please email support@creditoracademy.com with your account details and we'll process the cancellation within 24 hours.

subject: Course Access Issues
question: I cannot access my courses or course content is not loading
answer:
If you're having trouble accessing courses:

1. Clear your browser cache and cookies
2. Try a different browser (Chrome, Firefox, or Safari)
3. Log out completely and log back in
4. Check if your subscription is active in Account Settings
5. Ensure you have a stable internet connection

If the problem persists:
- Email support@creditoracademy.com with your username
- Include which course you're trying to access
- Send a screenshot of any error messages

Our team will restore your access within 24 hours.

subject: When Will I Be Charged
question: When will my credit card be charged?
answer:
Your credit card will be charged:

- **Initial Payment**: Immediately upon completing registration
- **Monthly Subscriptions**: On the same date each month (the date you signed up)
- **Annual Subscriptions**: On the anniversary of your signup date

You'll receive an email receipt after each charge. To view your billing history:
1. Log into your account
2. Go to Account Settings > Billing
3. View past invoices and upcoming charges

If you need to update your payment method, you can do so in the Billing section before your next charge date.

subject: Live Class Schedule
question: How do I join live classes and when are they scheduled?
answer:
To join live classes:

**Finding the Schedule:**
1. Log into your account
2. Go to 'Live Classes' or 'Schedule' in your dashboard
3. View upcoming sessions with dates and times

**Joining a Live Class:**
1. Click on the scheduled class 15 minutes before start time
2. Click 'Join Live Session' button
3. Allow camera/microphone permissions if participating

**Live Class Times:**
- Classes are typically held Monday, Wednesday, Friday at 7 PM EST
- All sessions are recorded and available in your course library within 24 hours

**Can't Attend Live?**
Don't worry! All recordings are automatically added to your account so you can watch anytime.

subject: Missing Course Content
question: I'm missing course videos or content that should be available
answer:
If you can't find specific course content:

**Check Your Course Progress:**
1. Some content unlocks progressively as you complete earlier lessons
2. Look for a lock icon indicating prerequ¬≠isite lessons

**Search for Content:**
1. Use the search bar in your course dashboard
2. Check the 'Resources' or 'Downloads' section
3. Look in 'Completed Lessons' - you may have already watched it

**Still Can't Find It?**
Email support@creditoracademy.com with:
- The course name
- The specific video or module you're looking for
- A description of what you expected to see

We'll locate it or add it to your account within 24 hours.

subject: Password Reset
question: How do I reset my password or recover my account?
answer:
To reset your password:

1. Go to creditoracademy.com/login
2. Click 'Forgot Password?' below the login button
3. Enter your registered email address
4. Check your email for reset link (check spam folder too)
5. Click the link and create a new password

**Password Requirements:**
- At least 8 characters
- Include uppercase and lowercase letters
- Include at least one number

**Email Not Arriving?**
- Wait 5-10 minutes (it may be delayed)
- Check your spam/junk folder
- Try requesting another reset
- Email support@creditoracademy.com if you still don't receive it

**Can't Remember Email?**
Contact support@creditoracademy.com with your name and any other account details you remember.

subject: Refund Policy
question: What is your refund policy?
answer:
**Creditor Academy Refund Policy:**

**30-Day Money-Back Guarantee:**
- Full refund available within 30 days of initial purchase
- Available for first-time subscribers only
- Must have accessed less than 25% of course content

**How to Request a Refund:**
1. Email support@creditoracademy.com within 30 days
2. Include your account email and reason for refund
3. Refunds processed within 5-7 business days
4. Funds return to original payment method

**After 30 Days:**
- Monthly subscriptions: No refund, but you can cancel anytime
- Annual subscriptions: Prorated refund may be available on case-by-case basis

**Questions?** Contact support@creditoracademy.com

subject: Technical Issues - Video Won't Play
question: Videos won't play or keep buffering
answer:
If videos aren't playing properly:

**Quick Fixes:**
1. Refresh the page (F5 or Ctrl+R)
2. Clear browser cache and cookies
3. Try a different browser (Chrome recommended)
4. Pause video, wait 30 seconds, then play
5. Lower video quality (click gear icon)

**Check Your Connection:**
- Need at least 5 Mbps for smooth streaming
- Test your speed at speedtest.net
- Close other bandwidth-heavy apps
- Try using wired connection instead of WiFi

**Still Having Issues?**
Email support@creditoracademy.com with:
- Your browser and version
- Screenshot of the error
- Your internet speed test result

We can provide downloadable versions if streaming doesn't work.

subject: Update Payment Information
question: How do I update my credit card or payment method?
answer:
To update your payment information:

1. Log into your account at creditoracademy.com
2. Click on your name/profile in top right
3. Select 'Account Settings' or 'Billing'
4. Click 'Update Payment Method' or 'Change Card'
5. Enter new card details
6. Click 'Save' or 'Update'

**Security:**
- All payment data is encrypted and secure
- We never store full card numbers
- You'll receive confirmation email after update

**Failed Payment?**
If your card was declined:
- Update to a valid card ASAP to maintain access
- Check with your bank if charges are being blocked
- Contact support@creditoracademy.com if you need help

subject: Download Course Materials
question: Can I download videos and course materials?
answer:
**Downloadable Content:**

**What You CAN Download:**
- PDF guides and workbooks
- Templates and forms
- Audio versions of lessons
- Slides and handouts

**How to Download:**
1. Open the course lesson
2. Look for 'Resources' or 'Downloads' tab
3. Click download icon next to each file
4. Files save to your Downloads folder

**Video Downloads:**
- Most videos are streaming-only to protect content
- Premium members can download select videos
- Contact support if you need offline access for travel

**Can't Find Downloads?**
Some older courses may not have downloads. Email support@creditoracademy.com to request materials for specific courses.

subject: Certificate of Completion
question: How do I get my certificate of completion?
answer:
To receive your certificate:

**Requirements:**
1. Complete 100% of course modules
2. Pass all quizzes (if applicable)
3. Mark all lessons as 'Complete'

**Accessing Your Certificate:**
1. Complete the final lesson
2. Certificate generates automatically
3. Find it in 'My Certificates' section
4. Click 'Download' or 'Print'

**Certificate Includes:**
- Your name
- Course title
- Completion date
- Creditor Academy seal

**Not Showing Up?**
- Check your course progress is 100%
- Wait 24 hours after completing final lesson
- Email support@creditoracademy.com with course name if still missing

subject: Mobile App Access
question: Can I access courses on my phone or tablet?
answer:
**Mobile Access Options:**

**Web Browser (Recommended):**
- Go to creditoracademy.com on your mobile browser
- Log in with your credentials
- All courses work on mobile browsers
- Works on iPhone, Android, iPad, tablets

**Mobile App:**
- Currently developing dedicated app
- Web version is fully mobile-optimized
- Save creditoracademy.com to home screen for app-like experience

**Tips for Mobile Learning:**
- Use WiFi for video streaming to save data
- Download PDFs while on WiFi, read offline
- Landscape mode works best for videos
- Use headphones for better audio

**Technical Issues on Mobile?**
Email support@creditoracademy.com with your device model and issue description.

subject: Account Sharing Policy
question: Can I share my account with family or friends?
answer:
**Account Sharing Policy:**

**Single User License:**
- Each account is for ONE individual user only
- Sharing login credentials violates Terms of Service
- May result in account suspension

**Why?**
- Ensures fair access for all members
- Protects course content and creators
- Maintains quality of community discussions

**Want Multiple Users?**
- Family plans available for same household
- Business/team licenses available
- Special education pricing for groups
- Contact support@creditoracademy for group rates

**Caught Sharing?**
- First offense: Warning
- Repeat offense: Account termination without refund

subject: Pause or Freeze Membership
question: Can I pause or freeze my subscription temporarily?
answer:
**Subscription Pause Options:**

**Monthly Subscriptions:**
- No pause option available
- You can cancel and rejoin anytime
- Your progress is saved even after canceling

**Annual Subscriptions:**
- Cannot pause, but have full year access
- Access continues for entire paid period

**Alternative Solutions:**
1. **Cancel Now, Rejoin Later:**
   - Cancel monthly subscription
   - Your work is saved for 6 months
   - Rejoin anytime to continue

2. **Keep Access:**
   - Continue subscription ($47/month)
   - Worth it if you'll use it soon

3. **Downgrade:**
   - Switch to basic plan (if available)
   - Lower monthly cost

**Need to Pause Due to Emergency?**
Contact support@creditoracademy.com - we may be able to accommodate special circumstances.

subject: Live Support Hours
question: What are your customer support hours?
answer:
**Creditor Academy Support:**

**Email Support:**
- support@creditoracademy.com
- Available 24/7
- Response time: 24-48 hours
- Fastest for non-urgent issues

**Live Chat:**
- Monday-Friday: 9 AM - 6 PM EST
- Available in your account dashboard
- Click chat icon in bottom right

**Phone Support:**
- Premium members only
- Available during business hours
- Number provided in Account Settings

**Response Times:**
- Urgent issues: Within 4 hours (business days)
- General questions: Within 24 hours
- Billing issues: Priority response within 24 hours

**Fastest Response?**
Email support@creditoracademy.com with detailed description including screenshots.

subject: Course Location Question
question: Where is my course
answer:
Let me help you find your courses! üîç

**To Access Your Courses:**

1. **Log In:**
   - Go to creditoracademy.com
   - Click 'Login' in top right
   - Enter your email and password

2. **Find Your Courses:**
   - Click 'My Courses' or 'Dashboard'
   - All your enrolled courses appear here
   - Click any course to start learning

3. **Search Function:**
   - Use search bar in dashboard
   - Type course name or topic
   - Filter by category if available

**Can't Find Your Course?**

**Possible Reasons:**
‚Ä¢ Subscription expired - check Account Settings
‚Ä¢ Not yet enrolled - verify your purchase email
‚Ä¢ Browser cache issue - try clearing cache
‚Ä¢ Logged in with wrong email - check confirmation email

**Still Can't Find It?**
Email support@creditoracademy.com with:
- Your account email
- Course name or purchase confirmation
- Screenshot of your dashboard

We'll locate it within 24 hours! üéØ
